snippet: A video shows the capture of a chimpanzee two hours after he fled from a zoo in northern Japan.
lead_paragraph: A video shows the capture of a chimpanzee two hours after he fled from a zoo in northern Japan.

headline.main: Chacha the Chimp Escapes Japanese Zoo, Then Takes a Fall
headline.print_headline: Chacha the Chimp Escapes Japanese Zoo, Then Takes a Fall
